Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_AdvCode' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'member_rank_id_granted_at_account_registration') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_AdvCode] ADD [member_rank_id_granted_at_account_registration] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_AdvCode' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'user_management_level_id_granted_at_account_registration') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_AdvCode] ADD [user_management_level_id_granted_at_account_registration] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkAdvCode' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'member_rank_id_granted_at_account_registration') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_WorkAdvCode] ADD [member_rank_id_granted_at_account_registration] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkAdvCode' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'user_management_level_id_granted_at_account_registration') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_WorkAdvCode] ADD [user_management_level_id_granted_at_account_registration] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END
